response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and expectations. After careful consideration of its value and the benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive offer to you. For a limited time, you have the opportunity to acquire this exceptional item at a special price of $18,000. This is an excellent chance to secure a high-quality product at a competitive rate. I believe this investment will greatly benefit you and provide substantial returns. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer. I look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 18000}
